details.title: Reflection of radar signals from multiple phase-modulated surfaces

authors.affiliation: Dept. of Electron. & Electr. Eng., Univ. of Sheffield
authors.name: B. Chambers

authors.affiliation: Dept. of Electron. & Electr. Eng., Univ. of Sheffield
authors.name: A. Tennant

details.abstract: A phase-modulated surface (PMS) has been shown to provide an effective method of dynamically controlling the scattering from simple planar or cylindrical targets. Real radar targets however have complex geometry comprised of many scattering centres, and multiple interactions may occur between these. Therefore, the authors explore whether the PMS technique is still effective when applied to more realistic target geometries

ieee.title: High-Resolution Range Profile Deception Method Based on Phase-Switched Screen
ieee.displayText: Letao Xu, Dejun Feng, Ran Zhang, Xuesong Wang, "High-Resolution Range Profile Deception Method Based on Phase-Switched Screen", Antennas and Wireless Propagation Letters IEEE, vol. 15, pp. 1665-1668, 2016, ISSN 1536-1225.
